settings.title: Why do I need an AM and PM Packet?
settings.content: At SurvivorRx, we've taken the initiative to streamline your supplement routine by curating our products into convenient AM/PM packs. Our meticulously crafted formulas are brimming with a multitude of nutrients tailored to meet your nutritional requirements. Our AM packets contain ingredients ideal for morning consumption, whether with or without food. Similarly, our PM packets are specifically formulated for evening intake, best accompanied by a meal.

settings.title: Can I take other supplements with my SurvivorRx products?
settings.content: We have specifically designed our supplements with Survivor’s comprehensive nutritional needs in mind. We have optimally dosed our ingredients and recommend using caution when adding any other supplements as in some cases, taking too much of some things can cause more harm than good. As always, we recommend you speak with your health provider for your specific needs.

settings.title: Why are there no B vitamins in your supplements?
settings.content: Research shows that although having adequate B vitamin levels is important for your health, taking high doses of some B vitamins may negatively affect your health post-cancer. For that reason, we did not include B vitamins in our main supplement formulas. We do understand that some Survivors are deficient in some B Vitamins. For that reason, if your health care provider recommends it, we do offer Vitamin B12 separately.

settings.title: Where are SurvivorRx mushrooms grown?
settings.content:
At SurvivorRx, we take pride in delivering mushroom extract powders of unparalleled quality. Our commitment to excellence begins with our careful selection of ingredients; we exclusively utilize the mushroom's fruiting body in all our products, as opposed to the commonly
employed mycelium (the mushroom's root system) cultivated with grain.

Our mushroom extracts originate from Nammex, the foremost supplier of organic mushroom extracts renowned for their over 40 years of expertise in mushroom cultivation. Pioneers in introducing organic medicinal mushroom extracts to North America, Nammex subjects their ingredients to stringent quality control measures. Each batch undergoes dual testing for heavy metals, agricultural chemicals, and microbial contamination, ensuring compliance with the highest standards for dietary supplements. Sourced from certified organic mushrooms, either organically cultivated or wildcrafted from the remote mountainous regions of China, our extracts embody purity and potency.

While North America's mushroom cultivation remains scarce due to cost constraints, China emerges as the global leader, supplying over 85% of the world's mushrooms. With a rich tradition of incorporating mushrooms into both culinary and medicinal practices, China stands as the cradle of mushroom cultivation, with shiitake farming dating back to the early 1200s. Notably, China offers 100% organic mushroom extracts at accessible prices, a feat unmatched elsewhere.

It's essential to discern that products manufactured in the USA predominantly utilize mycelium— the mushroom's root system grown on grains—rather than fruiting bodies mushrooms. As the mycelium and grain cannot be separated, these products contain a significant proportion of grain, thereby diluting the active compounds crucial for efficacy. Independent analyses have revealed minimal concentrations of these compounds in such products. Therefore, consumers are advised to scrutinize supplement labels meticulously for terms such as 'mycelium,' 'myceliated brown rice,' 'mycelial biomass,' 'full-spectrum,' 'whole life cycle,' or any derivatives thereof, which indicate mycelium-based products, not mushrooms.

To guarantee the potency and purity of our products, we conduct specific tests for beta-glucans and starch, showcasing the absence of fillers like grain. With us, you can trust that our products comprise nothing but 100% pure mushrooms."

settings.title: How do I set up an account for my subscription?
Can I change my shipment date?
How can I cancel my subscription?
How do I update my shipping and/or billing information?
How soon before shipment can I change my order?
How long does it take to get my order after my first purchase?
settings.content: For your first order, you will receive your order within 2 days.

settings.title: How soon before my shipment can I adjust the details of my order?
settings.content: You are able to adjust the details of your order such as supplements and timing for delivery up to one week before shipment.

settings.title: Am I able to return the product and get a full refund?
settings.content: We do not accept returns but you are able to get a full refund within the first week of receiving your order if you are not happy with your purchase.

settings.title: Do I have to return the dispenser I received with my subscription?
settings.content: No you do not have to return the dispenser you received.

settings.title: Still have questions?
settings.content: Reach out to us at teamsurvivor@survivorrx.com and we're happy to help.

settings.title: Medical Note
settings.content: The information provided on this site does not constitute medical advice. This information does not and should not replace treatment from a health care professional. If you need medical advice or assistance, you should always consult a health care professional.
